Definition: # of siblings / spouses aboard the Titanic
# of parents / children aboard the Titanic

Key: C = Cherbourg, Q = Queenstown, S = Southampton

Variable: age: Age is fractional if less than 1. If the age is estimated, is it in the form of xx.5
embarked: port of embarktion (C = Cherbourg; Q = Queenstown; S = Southampton)
parch: number of parents or children aboard (Some children travelled only with a nanny, therefore parch=0 for them.)
